body.name: Kleenex Professional Facial Tissue for Business (21400), Flat Tissue Boxes, 36 Boxes / Case, 100 Tissues / Box, 3,600 Tissues / Case

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 100 Tissues/Box, 36 Kleenex Professional Facial Tissue Boxes/Case; 3,600 Tissues/Case; 2-Ply; White; Flat Facial Tissue Boxes for Business
Kleenex is the world's number one facial tissue brand, trusted by more consumers than any other.
Each Kleenex tissue is 2-ply strong and absorbent, offering superior performance.
The last 10 tissues are cream instead of white, so you'll know it's time to replace the box.
These bulk tissues are Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified.
body.description: All facial tissues are not created equal. In fact, more people choose Kleenex Facial Tissue than any other brand. Kleenex tissue offers superior performance, a premium feel and essential softness. When your employees, patients and guests see the respected Kleenex brand in your business and restrooms, they'll know that you select quality products, putting forth the best image for your business. It's a popular choice in healthcare and medical offices, hotels and lodging and businesses in general. For more than 80 years, Kleenex has delivered the highest quality among facial tissues, providing consumers with smart innovations like an ultra-soft feel and Signal Sheets (the last 10 tissues are cream colored instead of white, so you know it's almost time for a new box). You'll want to buy them in bulk. Choosing Kleenex lets everyone know that you care enough to provide the very best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last for a long time and great value for money.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Would recommend this product. We go through about one box per year. My son's school also usually ask for donations either one so are multiple times per year and we use these to send about 5 or 10 boxes of time to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for a guest house or vehicles. Getting the last 1/3 to 1/4 of the tissues out of the larger boxes can be annoying, and the larger boxes take up too much space in tighter places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small in Size
reviews.reviewText: These tissues are smaller in size than most Kleenex brand tissues. They also seem to be more fragile and tear when used to blow my nose. However, they do the job okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars convenience in so many ways (we did a 6mo. subscription)
reviews.reviewText: We did a subscriptionAnd when you SEE ITIT IS A LOT OF BOXES OF TISSUEBut it's 3/4months into our subscription(I chose every 6 months)And we used a lot.I was super surprized.I thought this subscription item might have been too much but I am glad I was mistaken. Whew.So one person in my household has mobility issues.Going to costco or normal groceries is hard bc he doesnt move as fast and we are (I am always) very worried some kids/crazy suburban stay at home/aflluenza teen is going to run him over and be a jerk.So to prevent me from ever assailing people from running into/being jerks to himI decided we should get the subscription.Another selling point:Say you are the only one taking care of someone special needs and you are a costco-er such as ourselves.Costco is convenient.But let's say it's JUST YOU.You have to assist your special needs person up into the vehicle safelyas well as the goodsbc they may not be able to assist you depending on their needs/limitations.Also you have to unload by yourself while making sure you safely assist your special needs person from the vehicle into the house.My dad can't really lift boxes anymoreSo helping with bulk items can't and should NOT and DOES NOT happen.My mom is retired and older as well.Fully able butwith my scheduleI am not always with her to assist on errands.I either do errands for herto/from work or on days off.Instead oflifting an awkward bulk order of tissues off a shelf, onto/into a cart, off the cart, into the car, then out of the car, into the house, then putting them up/storing themORRMaking SO MANY runs to the store throughout the year for one or two boxes of facial tissue at a timeYou can subscribeand drag in an awkward parcelonce every 6 monthsStore it all and diminish supplies as you goFrom the comfort of your own home.(Ps I do the heavy lifting in the house)Our overall subscription order wasn't very heavyEspecially since the tissue boxes took up most of the room.It comes in it's own cardboard boxOnce you take it out to store, visually you think, 'HOOOLY... D:'We ordered in dec or janAnd we all have year round seasonal allergies.Plus we keep a box on the dinner tableA box in our carsOne by our bedsWe use a lot.I blow my nose a lot.I wipe my eyes a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like buying in bulk, The tissues are perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the Job
reviews.reviewText: As indicated above these tissues do the job - like that the color changes to orange letting you know the box is almost empty. The 36 box shipment means I have plenty for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars can't get just one tissue when new box opened
reviews.reviewText: These tissues are soft and absorbent and we have wall-inset dispensers in our bathrooms so the size is perfect.I have 2 complaints -When you open a new box, the first several times you try to get a tissue you can't pull just one w/out tearing it up - you will get 3+ tissues on one pull for about the first 4 or 5 pulls - too tight in box or something. This makes for either wasting some tissues or creating a stack of unused tissues on counter - not good.Also, there is no color change at end of box to indicate you are down to last 10 and will need new box.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice to get my favourite brand
reviews.reviewText: It was nice to find a supply of my favourite facial tissue brand after Kleenex exited Canada. Very happy

While buying tissue by the case (36 boxes) is not my normal, this has been a great purchase for 3 reasons.I have allergies and sneeze a lot.My new car no longer has a space for a box of tissues at seat level and stores where I live only sell the 4 inch high boxes which only hold 86 or less tissues.This Kleeex product is half the height so it can go on my dashboard without obstructing my driver's front view. And it has 100 tissues per box.The tissues are also Kleenex top quality and so a good sneeze does not blow any shotgun hole and nasal snot throug the tissue.

The product was delivered on the Monday after the Friday it was expected. I left a most negative review before the Monday and am so sorry I did. The seller and I have settled things, and this is the best I can do to make amends. So thank you so very much, and I would do business with this seller again anytime.
